definition: to stop one's pen/to break off writing/final remarks (at the end of a book or article)
to terminate/to cut short/to bring to a stop/to squeeze/to tighten/to damage/variant of 殺|杀[sha1]
pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]

sentences.english: The sandglass remembers the time we lost!
sentences.chinese: 煞筆記得，皒門遺忘旳時光。
